          <title>
            <string language="en">Behaviour of magnetic poles  same poles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verhalten der Magnetpole die gleichen Pfosten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comportement des pôles magnétiques les mêmes 
poteaux</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Comportamento de pólos magnéticos os mesmos 
pólos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Comportamento dei poli magnetici gli stessi pali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συμπεριφορά των ίδιων πόλων μαγνητικών πόλων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Comportamiento de polos magnéticos los mismos 
postes</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Second of three illustrations showing behaviour of magnetic poles. This illustration shows that same poles repel each other.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic attraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic forces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic materials</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">north pole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">repulsion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">south pole</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">An zweiter Stelle von drei Abbildungen, die 
Verhalten der Magnetpole zeigen. Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß die
gleichen Pfosten sich abstoßen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En second lieu de trois illustrations montrant le
comportement des pôles magnétiques. Cette illustration prouve 
que les mêmes poteaux se repoussent.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Em segundo de três ilustrações que mostram o 
comportamento de pólos magnéticos. Esta ilustração mostra 
que os mesmos pólos se repelem.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In secondo luogo di tre illustrazioni che 
mostrano comportamento dei poli magnetici. Questa illustrazione 
indica che gli stessi pali si respingono.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δεύτερη τριών απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν συμπεριφορά
των μαγνητικών πόλων. Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι οι 
ίδιοι πόλοι αποκρούουν ο ένας τον άλλον.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En segundo lugar de tres ilustraciones que 
muestran el comportamiento de polos magnéticos. Esta 
ilustración muestra que los mismos postes se rechazan.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetische Anziehung</string>
